name: Arvy's Apples
description:
When you first applied to Aaron Arvy's apple orchard for a summer job, you didn't know that you'd be transported into a surreal dimension where everything has to do with apples and caterpillars can eat you.

But there's no turning back now. Now, you have to pass the Test....

Note: I am looking for all types of contributors to help continue development. You must feel free to check out the Discord server: https://discord.gg/d4tA7xK!
